channel.title: Comcast DCM425C RCA Router can't port forward, Help
channel.description: I have attempted to port forward many times over the years (Mopar member for 2 and a half years =D) i try portforward.com a couple mopar tuts none of them can help all of them say the same thing get your ip and put it in address bar. Any one know how to port forward me?

item.title: Comcast DCM425C RCA Router can't port forward, Help
item.dc:creator: @Skillerscapeowner Skillerscapeowner
item.description:
@Skillerscapeowner wrote:

sorry i do not know of anywhere else to find out how to portforward

Read full topic

item.title: Comcast DCM425C RCA Router can't port forward, Help
item.dc:creator: @xmaker1 xmaker1
item.description:
@xmaker1 wrote:

I had another account but i got bored when Server status page was put up because i couldn’t Pf and no one joins HAM servers forgot pass word to the acc and started this one about a week ago.

@ Skiller~ I don’t really have any money to buy a new router i need one for my other computer as well but where would i find a way to PF my router i have now? (portforward.com doesn’t have my router.)

Read full topic
item.source: Comcast DCM425C RCA Router can't port forward, Help

item.title: Comcast DCM425C RCA Router can't port forward, Help
item.dc:creator: @Skillerscapeowner Skillerscapeowner
item.description:
@Skillerscapeowner wrote:

A Comcast router is really hard to portforward i would reccomend getting a Linksys they are the easiest to portforward.

Reguards,
Skillerscapeowner (Luke)

Read full topic
item.source: Comcast DCM425C RCA Router can't port forward, Help

item.title: Comcast DCM425C RCA Router can't port forward, Help
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

I just thought I’d say this… You’ve been a member for 2 years and you’re a first time poster? Anyways, port forwarding isn’t allowed here but I’ll just tell you want to do to get to your router since I think that’s what you’re having problems with when you say you put your ip in the address bar. Try putting it 192.168.1.1. If that doesn’t work, then look up your router on www.portforward.com and see what you have to put in.

Read full topic
item.source: Comcast DCM425C RCA Router can't port forward, Help

item.description:

There isn’t one. If you have a Linksys router, PM me and I might be able to help. Otherwise, I can’t help you sorry.

Read full topic
